Package de.axxepta.emailwrapper

Class Mail

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.axxepta.emailwrapper.Mail

  • public class Mail
extends java.lang.Object
    Wrapper utility class for Apache commons mail (version 1.5), provides static functions for sending mails, e.g. for use in XQuery.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Method Detail

      • sendMail

        public static java.lang.String sendMail​(boolean sslTls,
                                        java.lang.String host,
                                        int port,
                                        java.lang.String user,
                                        java.lang.String pwd,
                                        java.lang.String from,
                                        java.lang.String to,
                                        java.lang.String subject,
                                        java.lang.String msg,
                                        boolean... reportError)
                                 throws org.apache.commons.mail.EmailException
        Send text mail
        Parameters:
        sslTls - Use secure transport layer
        host - SMTP host
        port - SMTP/SSMTP port
        user - User name
        pwd - Password
        from - Sender address
        to - Recipient(s) address(es), multiple can be provided separated by comma or semicolon
        subject - Subject
        msg - Message
        reportError - Set optional true value if exceptions should be thrown instead of returning a failed xml element with message
        Returns:
        success or failed xml element, latter containing error message
        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.mail.EmailException

      • sendHTMLMail

        public static java.lang.String sendHTMLMail​(boolean sslTls,
                                            java.lang.String host,
                                            int port,
                                            java.lang.String user,
                                            java.lang.String pwd,
                                            java.lang.String from,
                                            java.lang.String to,
                                            java.lang.String subject,
                                            java.lang.String msg,
                                            java.lang.String msgText,
                                            boolean... reportError)
                                     throws org.apache.commons.mail.EmailException
        Send HTML mail
        Parameters:
        sslTls - Use secure transport layer
        host - SMTP host
        port - SMTP/SSMTP port
        user - User name
        pwd - Password
        from - Sender address
        to - Recipient(s) address(es), multiple can be provided separated by comma or semicolon
        subject - Subject
        msg - Message
        msgText - Alternative text message
        reportError - Set optional true value if exceptions should be thrown instead of returning a failed xml element with message
        Returns:
        success or failed xml element, latter containing error message
        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.mail.EmailException

      • sendImageHTMLMail

        public static java.lang.String sendImageHTMLMail​(boolean sslTls,
                                                 java.lang.String host,
                                                 int port,
                                                 java.lang.String user,
                                                 java.lang.String pwd,
                                                 java.lang.String from,
                                                 java.lang.String to,
                                                 java.lang.String subject,
                                                 java.lang.String msg,
                                                 java.lang.String msgText,
                                                 java.lang.String baseUrl,
                                                 boolean... reportError)
                                          throws org.apache.commons.mail.EmailException
        Send HTML mail, embed images referenced by img element in body
        Parameters:
        sslTls - Use secure transport layer
        host - SMTP host
        port - SMTP/SSMTP port
        user - User name
        pwd - Password
        from - Sender address
        to - Recipient(s) address(es), multiple can be provided separated by comma or semicolon
        subject - Subject
        msg - Message
        msgText - Alternative text message
        baseUrl - Base URL for images to be embedded, provided with relative path
        reportError - Set optional true value if exceptions should be thrown instead of returning a failed xml element with message
        Returns:
        success or failed xml element, latter containing error message
        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.mail.EmailException

      • sendAttachmentMail

        public static java.lang.String sendAttachmentMail​(boolean sslTls,
                                                  java.lang.String host,
                                                  int port,
                                                  java.lang.String user,
                                                  java.lang.String pwd,
                                                  java.lang.String from,
                                                  java.lang.String to,
                                                  java.lang.String subject,
                                                  java.lang.String msg,
                                                  java.util.List<java.lang.String> attachments,
                                                  boolean... reportError)
                                           throws org.apache.commons.mail.EmailException
        Send mail, attach files
        Parameters:
        sslTls - Use secure transport layer
        host - SMTP host
        port - SMTP/SSMTP port
        user - User name
        pwd - Password
        from - Sender address
        to - Recipient(s) address(es), multiple can be provided separated by comma or semicolon
        subject - Subject
        msg - Message
        attachments - List of files to be attached
        reportError - Set optional true value if exceptions should be thrown instead of returning a failed xml element with message
        Returns:
        success or failed xml element, latter containing error message
        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.mail.EmailException
